wishdalemod:Wishdalebadge.NAME: Vishdal Badge
wishdalemod:Wishdalebadge.FLAVOR: Issued to Operator performing grenadier duties. This certifies the above.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Attack card played each turn is played twice, with the second instance dealing half damage

wishdalemod:WishdalebadgePingheng.NAME: Vishdal Badge
wishdalemod:WishdalebadgePingheng.FLAVOR: Issued to Operator performing grenadier duties. This certifies the above.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Attack card played each combat is played twice, with the second instance dealing half damage

wishdalemod:AncestralLauncher.NAME: Ancestor Launcher
wishdalemod:AncestralLauncher.FLAVOR: Go forth and explode more violently!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gVishdal Badge
The first Attack card played each turn is played three times, with subsequent instances dealing half damage
The first Attack card played each turn is played twice, with the second instance dealing half damage

wishdalemod:GoldBoneDice.NAME: "Gilded Bone Dice"
wishdalemod:GoldBoneDice.FLAVOR: Only one face of the gilded dice bears the mark of survival. As for the other nineteen...
DESCRIPTIONS: All enemies lose #b
% of their HP.

wishdalemod:RoaringHand.NAME: Roaring Hand
wishdalemod:RoaringHand.FLAVOR: Strikes true and shakes the earth.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain temporary Strength that increases by 1 (up to 15) for each consecutive Attack card played. Resets if no Attack cards are played in a turn

wishdalemod:AncientTreeFruit.NAME: Ancient Arbor Fruit
wishdalemod:AncientTreeFruit.FLAVOR: The Sami prayed upon these seeds, buried in snow. When the tree bore fruit, they took the first four as offerings, leaving the smallest for future generations.
DESCRIPTIONS: Immediately gain three random trinkets
Branches sway...
Lost within
Close

wishdalemod:Ruozhitutou.NAME: Rabbit Head Trophy
DESCRIPTIONS: What tier are you?
@Believe in the Martial Soul True Form!@ NL @All troops attack!@ NL @I'll bite you to death!@

wishdalemod:HotWaterBottle.NAME: Hot Water Bottle
wishdalemod:HotWaterBottle.FLAVOR: The same model used in Rhodes Island offices. Someone frequently uses it to cook instant noodles late at night - not the healthiest habit...
DESCRIPTIONS: When picked up, increase your Max HP by 2 and gain 15 #yGold

wishdalemod:Guowangdexinqiang.NAME: King's New Gun
wishdalemod:Guowangdexinqiang.FLAVOR: Beautiful wishes in desperate times can bring hope, even when they're not the truth.
DESCRIPTIONS: When your HP is at or below #b10% or #b10, gain #b
additional #yDexterity.

wishdalemod:Guowangdekaijia.NAME: King's Armor
wishdalemod:Guowangdekaijia.FLAVOR: The palace square once displayed golden shrines and exotic treasures for all to see. The memory still brings sorrow, alas!
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of combat, gain Block equal to missing HP and #b1 stack of #yAfterimage. After combat, lose 3 HP (cannot die) and gain #b1 #yArtifact

wishdalemod:Guowangdeyanshen.NAME: King's Extension
wishdalemod:Guowangdeyanshen.FLAVOR: Grow, face reality, arm yourself with resilience and determination, arm your friends with tolerance and mercy.
DESCRIPTIONS: When your HP is at or below #b10% or #b10, gain [E] every #b
turns.

wishdalemod:Zhuwangdeguanmian.NAME: Crown of the Monarchs
wishdalemod:Zhuwangdeguanmian.FLAVOR: Oh nameless kings, though your kingdoms have fallen, may you still protect Iberia.
DESCRIPTIONS: When your HP is at or below #b10% or #b10, gain #b
additional #yStrength. If you have 3+ King's Relics, gain
#yStrength instead

wishdalemod:GuowangdeHujie.NAME: King's Protective Ring
wishdalemod:GuowangdeHujie.FLAVOR: The Deep Sea Cult was not formed in a day. Long lurking between sea and land, they plot the calamity later called the 'Great Silence'.
DESCRIPTIONS: Max HP becomes #b1, recording the amount reduced. When taking #rfatal damage, consume the recorded amount to negate it. Resets at start of combat.
